html:
2 Nephi 13:24-26

These last three verses depict a time of ravaging war. Perhaps this is where the women will lose all their finery. The smell of death will be strong and the people will be taken captive. They will mourn their oppressed condition.

24 And it shall come to pass, that instead of sweet smell there shall be stink; and instead of a girdle a rent; and instead of well set hair baldness; and instead of a stomacher a girding of sackcloth; and burning instead of beauty.

25 Thy men shall fall by the sword, and thy mighty in the war.

26 And her gates shall lament and mourn; and she being desolate shall sit upon the ground.
